title: August 2023 Android security patch here for Pixel phones and the Pixel Tablet

title: You shouldn’t buy these Chromebooks, even on sale
description: Thanks to Automatic Update Expiration, these Chromebooks will no longer receive any software updates.

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5 beats Motorola Razr Plus in marathon folding test
description: The folding display of the Motorola Razr Plus broke after 126,300 folds. The Z Flip 5 is still going strong.

title: Think your Pixel is hacked? Google now gives you a new way to check.

title: ASUS is apparently killing the ability to root present and future Zenfones
description: The company says the Zenfone 9 and Zenfone 10 can't be unlocked. The new policy might apply to future phones too.
